meaning: The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry and commerce.
example: Advancements in technology have revolutionized various industries.

meaning: The exchange of information, thoughts, ideas, or feelings through speech, writing, or other mediums.
example: Effective communication is essential for building strong relationships.

meaning: A tool or instrument designed to perform a specific task or function.
example: Smartphones are versatile devices that can perform various functions.

meaning: An electronic device capable of processing and storing data, performing calculations, and carrying out various tasks.
example: I use a computer for both work and entertainment purposes.

meaning: A portable computer that can be used on a person's lap, designed for mobility and convenience.
example: I prefer using a laptop for working while traveling.

meaning: A flat, portable device with a touchscreen interface, typically used for browsing the internet, reading, and entertainment.
example: Tablets are popular for reading e-books and playing games.

meaning: A mobile device that combines the functions of a cell phone with those of a computer, typically offering internet access, apps, and more.
example: My smartphone helps me stay connected and organized throughout the day.

meaning: A software program designed to perform specific tasks or provide entertainment on a computer or mobile device.
example: I use a weather app to check the forecast before planning outdoor activities.

meaning: A collection of interconnected web pages hosted on a single domain, accessible through the internet.
example: I found a recipe for a delicious cake on a cooking website.

meaning: A global network of interconnected computers and servers that allows the sharing of information and resources.
example: The internet has transformed the way we access and share information.

meaning: A method of exchanging digital messages over the internet, typically between individuals or groups.
example: I sent an email to my colleague to discuss the upcoming project.

meaning: Websites and applications that enable users to create and share content, as well as participate in social networking.
example: Many people use social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter to connect with friends and share updates.

meaning: A written or spoken conversation between two or more people; to engage in such a conversation.
example: I had a nice chat with my friend online.

meaning: A piece of information sent or received; to send or receive information using words or other methods.
example: I received a text message from my colleague.

meaning: Written words or symbols; to send a written message.
example: She sent me a text asking about our meeting.

meaning: A telephone conversation; to make or receive a telephone conversation.
example: I'll give you a call later to discuss the details.

meaning: A communication method that allows people to see and hear each other in real-time using video and audio technology.
example: We had a video call with our relatives who live abroad.

meaning: A device used to capture or record images and videos.
example: He used his camera to take stunning photos during the vacation.

meaning: A photograph that one takes of oneself, typically with a smartphone or webcam.
example: She snapped a quick selfie while waiting for the bus.

meaning: A technology that allows devices to connect to the internet without using physical cables.
example: I connected my laptop to the Wi-Fi network to browse the web.

meaning: A secret combination of letters, numbers, or symbols used to access a computer system or an online account.
example: Make sure to choose a strong password to protect your online accounts.

meaning: A unique name used to identify oneself on a computer system or online platform.
example: I couldn't log in because I forgot my username.

meaning: To seek or examine information, data, or answers using a computer or other means; the act of seeking information.
example: I need to search for a recipe for tonight's dinner.

meaning: A software application used to access and view websites on the internet.
example: I opened my browser to read the latest news.

meaning: To transfer data or files from a remote computer or server to a local device.
example: I need to download the software to my computer before I can use it.

meaning: To send or transfer data or files from a local device to a remote computer or server.
example: You can upload your photos to the cloud for safekeeping.

meaning: A reference or connection between two separate pieces of information or resources.
example: The link provided in the email led me to an interesting article.

meaning: A small graphical representation or symbol that represents a program, file, or function.
example: Click on the camera icon to open the photo app.

meaning: A set of keys or buttons used to input characters or commands into a computer or device.
example: She typed a message on the keyboard and hit the 'Enter' key.

meaning: A hand-held device used to control the movement of the cursor on a computer screen.
example: Move the mouse to select different options on the screen.

meaning: To press a button on a mouse or other pointing device to interact with an on-screen element.
example: Click on the link to open the webpage.

meaning: The surface on which visual information is displayed, such as a computer monitor or smartphone display.
example: The movie is playing on the big screen in the theater.

meaning: To show or exhibit information or images on a screen or other visual medium.
example: The museum had an impressive display of ancient artifacts.

meaning: An online platform where users can browse, download, and install various software applications for their devices.
example: I found a useful productivity app in the app store.

meaning: Computer programs or applications that provide specific functions or tasks when executed on a device.
example: I use graphic design software to create digital artwork.

meaning: The physical components of a computer or electronic device, such as the processor, memory, and peripherals.
example: Upgrading the hardware of my computer improved its performance.

meaning: The software that manages computer hardware and provides services for other software applications.
example: Windows and macOS are examples of operating systems.

meaning: A message or signal that informs or updates a user about an event or activity.
example: I received a notification on my phone about the upcoming meeting.

meaning: Options or preferences that allow customization of a device, application, or system.
example: You can adjust the display settings to make the screen brighter.

meaning: The state of being free from unauthorized access or intrusion into personal information.
example: I value my privacy and ensure that my online accounts have strong passwords.

meaning: Measures taken to protect against threats, risks, or unauthorized access.
example: The company invested in robust security measures to prevent data breaches.

meaning: A malicious software program that can replicate itself and spread to other computers or devices.
example: I scanned my computer for viruses using antivirus software.

meaning: Software designed to harm, exploit, or gain unauthorized access to computer systems.
example: He accidentally downloaded malware while clicking on a suspicious link.

meaning: A duplicate copy of data or files created as a precaution against data loss.
example: I regularly create a backup of my important files on an external hard drive.

meaning: A network of remote servers used for storing and managing data over the internet.
example: I uploaded my photos to the cloud to free up space on my phone.

meaning: Connected to or available through the internet.
example: I enjoy shopping online for convenience and a wide selection of products.

meaning: Not connected to the internet or a network.
example: I prefer to work offline when I need to focus on writing.

meaning: Relating to or using technology that involves the use of computerized or electronic signals.
example: We live in a digital age where most of our communication is done through screens.

meaning: Help or guidance provided to users experiencing technical issues with devices, software, or systems.
example: I called tech support when my computer was not connecting to the internet.

meaning: To replace or enhance a device, software, or system with a newer or better version.
example: I decided to upgrade my phone to get access to new features and improved performance.
